description: Table B(n,m) read by rows: B(n,m) = LCM(n,m)/n + LCM(n,m)/m - 1 for all 1<=m<=n.
comments: In an n X m box, a ball makes B(n,m) "bounces" starting at one corner until it reaches another corner, only allowed to travel on diagonal grid lines. B(n+2,n) = A022998(n+1) for all n >= 1. B(2n-1,n) = A016777(n) = 3n + 1 for all n >= 1 (central vertical).
author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu) Dec 15 2000
